text: You will find a series of statements that describe how people may react to the uncertainties of life.  Please use the scale to describe to what extent each item is characteristic of you.
Uncertainty stops me from having a firm opinion
Answers: Not at all characteristic of me||||Highly characteristic of me

text: Being uncertain means that a person is disorganized
Answers: Not at all characteristic of me||||Highly characteristic of me

text: Uncertainty makes life intolerable
Answers: Not at all characteristic of me||||Highly characteristic of me

text: It's not fair that there are no guarantees in life
Answers: Not at all characteristic of me||||Highly characteristic of me

text: My mind can't be relaxed if I don’t know what will happen tomorrow
Answers: Not at all characteristic of me||||Highly characteristic of me

text: Uncertainty makes me uneasy, anxious, or stressed
Answers: Not at all characteristic of me||||Highly characteristic of me

text: Unforseen events upset me greatly
Answers: Not at all characteristic of me||||Highly characteristic of me

text: It frustrates me not having all the information I need

text: Being uncertain allows me to forsee the consequences beforehand and to prepare for them
Answers: Not at all characteristic of me||||Highly characteristic of me

text: One should always look ahead so as to avoid surprises
Answers: Not at all characteristic of me||||Highly characteristic of me

text: A small unforseen event can spoil everything, even with the best of planning
Answers: Not at all characteristic of me||||Highly characteristic of me

text: When it's time to act uncertainty paralyzes me
Answers: Not at all characteristic of me||||Highly characteristic of me

text: Being uncertain means that I am not first rate

text: When I am uncertain I can't go forward

text: When I am uncertain I can't function very well
Answers: Not at all characteristic of me||||Highly characteristic of me

text: Unlike me, others always seem to know where they are going with their lives
Answers: Not at all characteristic of me||||Highly characteristic of me

text: Uncertainty makes me vulnerable, unhappy, or sad
Answers: Not at all characteristic of me||||Highly characteristic of me

text: I always want to know what the future has in store for me
Answers: Not at all characteristic of me||||Highly characteristic of me

text: I hate being taken by surprise

text: The smallest doubt stops mefrom acting
Answers: Not at all characteristic of me||||Highly characteristic of me

text: I should be able to organize everything in advance
Answers: Not at all characteristic of me||||Highly characteristic of me

text: Being uncertain means that I lack confidence
Answers: Not at all characteristic of me||||Highly characteristic of me

text: I think it's unfair that other people seem sure about their future
Answers: Not at all characteristic of me||||Highly characteristic of me

text: Uncertainty stops me from sleeping well
